name: Glass Cannon (SuperCitrus)
description:
Glass Cannon is an action platformer high score challenge where the player must hurt themselves in order to charge their shot. Do your best to keep yourself healthy while you contend with an onslaught of enemies! Made in 3 hours for Trijam #180

Controls:

WASD: Move 

P: Jump

O: Shoot

The game also supports gamepads!

Analog Stick/Dpad: Move

A: Jump

X or B: Shoot
